Package org.apache.commons.math4.stat.inference

Classes providing hypothesis testing.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinomialTest
    Implements binomial test statistics.
    BinomialTestTest
    Test cases for the BinomialTest class.
    ChiSquareTest
    Implements Chi-Square test statistics.
    ChiSquareTestTest
    Test cases for the ChiSquareTestImpl class.
    GTest
    Implements G Test statistics.
    GTestTest
    Test cases for the GTest class.
    KolmogorovSmirnovTest
    Implementation of the Kolmogorov-Smirnov (K-S) test for equality of continuous distributions.
    KolmogorovSmirnovTestTest
    Test cases for KolmogorovSmirnovTest.
    MannWhitneyUTest
    An implementation of the Mann-Whitney U test (also called Wilcoxon rank-sum test).
    MannWhitneyUTestTest
    Test cases for the MannWhitneyUTestImpl class.
    OneWayAnova
    Implements one-way ANOVA (analysis of variance) statistics.
    OneWayAnovaTest
    Test cases for the OneWayAnovaImpl class.
    TestUtils
    A collection of static methods to create inference test instances or to perform inference tests.
    TestUtilsTest
    Test cases for the TestUtils class.
    TTest
    An implementation for Student's t-tests.
    TTestTest
    Test cases for the TTestImpl class.
    WilcoxonSignedRankTest
    An implementation of the Wilcoxon signed-rank test.
    WilcoxonSignedRankTestTest
    Test cases for the WilcoxonSignedRangTest class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AlternativeHypothesis
    Represents an alternative hypothesis for a hypothesis test.

Package org.apache.commons.math4.stat.inference Description

Classes providing hypothesis testing.
